dict.acceptation: <口>小孩；小山羊，小山羊皮制品；
较年幼的；小山羊皮制的；

sent.orig: A kid is a baby goat.
If my dog had a kid, and that kid had a pet, that would be Sid.
sent.trans: 如果我养的狗要有一个伙伴，并且那个伙伴要有只宠物，那就是希德。

sent.orig: A little kid fell in love with another little kid, a school mate.
sent.trans: 有个小孩爱上了另一个小孩，对方是学校的同学。

sent.orig: Did you ever do gymnastics as a kid? -I did a little bit as a kid.
sent.trans: 你过去小孩子的时候有没有练过体操呢？-在小孩子的时候练过一点。

sent.orig: Was he the home-schooled kid with the glasses or the Asian kid allergic to light?
sent.trans: 戴眼镜那个家庭学校的小子还是那个对阳光过敏的亚裔？
